sentences.sentence: We got a lot of acrobatic types of people.
This is not the average cultural exchange. There are no obscure acrobatic troupes and no awkward high school students.
sentences.translation: 这不是一般的文化交流。这里没有不起眼的杂技团，也没有笨拙的高中生。

sentences.sentence: She shunned bodily ornamentation and strove to use only the natural movements of her body, undistorted by acrobatic exaggeration and stimulated only by internal compulsion.
sentences.translation: 她避开身体上的装饰，努力只使用身体的自然动作，不被杂技般的夸张所扭曲，只被内心的强迫所刺激。
